Module com.lmax.solana4j
Package com.lmax.solana4j.programs

Class Token2022Program.Token2022ProgramFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lmax.solana4j.programs.TokenProgramBase.TokenProgramBaseFactory
      • com.lmax.solana4j.programs.Token2022Program.Token2022ProgramFactory
  • Enclosing class:
    Token2022Program
    public static final class Token2022Program.Token2022ProgramFactory
extends TokenProgramBase.TokenProgramBaseFactory
    Inner factory class for creating transactions for the Token 2022 program using a token program id and TransactionBuilder.

    This factory extends the TokenProgramBase.TokenProgramBaseFactory class to provide functionality specific to the Token 2022 program.
